relationships.description: Harry has the potential to destroy another Horcrux, as indicated by Dumbledore.
Dumbledore is searching for another Horcrux.
Harry will assist Dumbledore in destroying the next Horcrux.
A Horcrux contains a piece of Voldemort's soul.
